mapper.select: select * from (select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, aa.* from (select * from GOODS order by GOODS_SALE_NUMBER desc limit 0, 5) aa, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP) bb where rnum <= 5
select COUNT(GOODS_INDEX) from Goods where GOODS_CATEGORY_CODE=${gCode}
select GOODS_NAME from GOODS where GOODS_INDEX=#{goods_index}
mapper.update: update GOODS set GOODS_REVIEW_NUMBER = GOODS_REVIEW_NUMBER+1 WHERE GOODS_INDEX=${goods_index}
update GOODS set GOODS_REVIEW_NUMBER = GOODS_REVIEW_NUMBER-1 WHERE GOODS_INDEX=${goods_index}
mapper.select: select GOODS_INDEX from GOODS where GOODS_NAME=#{goods_name}
mapper.update: update GOODS set GOODS_SALE_NUMBER = GOODS_SALE_NUMBER+1 WHERE GOODS_INDEX=${goods_index}
update GOODS set GOODS_STOCK_NUMBER = GOODS_STOCK_NUMBER-1 WHERE GOODS_INDEX=${goods_index}
mapper.select: select * from (select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 rnum, aa.* from (select * from GOODS where GOODS_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or CREATOR_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by GOODS_SALE_NUMBER desc limit ${(cp-1)*ps}, ${cp*ps}) aa, (SELECT @ROWNUM := ${(cp-1)*ps}) TMP) bb where rnum>${(cp-1)*ps} and rnum<=${cp*ps}
select COUNT(GOODS_INDEX) from GOODS where GOODS_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or CREATOR_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
